ca.ualberta.cmput301w15t13.Models

Class ExpenseItemList

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.cmput301w15t13.Models.ExpenseItemList

  • public class ExpenseItemList
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is a container for individual expense items. It should be used by a claim object to manage it's constituent expense items. Classes it works with: ExpenseItem,Claim
